item.title: 52 Pies
item.description: Jan. 2021 week 1: Jan. 4th - Jan. 10th Chocolate Caramel Banana Cream Pie, from Tartine: B week 3: Jan. 18th - Jan. 24th Chicken Curry Pot Pie, from Washington Post: B week 4: Jan. 25th - Jan. 31st Chocolate Pudding Pie, from Tartine, although not this exact recipe: C Feb. 2021 week 5: Feb. 1st - Feb. 7th Strawberry Cream Cheese Poptarts, pie crust from King Arthur Flour, strawberry jam and cream cheese filling my own: A

item.title: DS4SE
item.description: DS4SE, or Data Science for Software Engineering is an exploration into using natural language processing to auto-generate source code.

item.title: Quarantine Gothic
item.description: A twine game made in the early pandemic, that you can’t win and isn’t fun.

item.title: Hello there
item.description: about My name is (Meg) Anderson. I am an Edison Engineer at GE Healthcare, a student, a scientist, and artist. I am an alumni of William & Mary, ‘20. a disclaimer on my internet presence All opinions expressed are (or were at one point) my own. My beliefs do not represent those of my employers. I have had internet access since age 10, and started posting shitty middle school hot-takes on facebook shortly thereafter.

item.description: A basic timing of jobs, positions, and awards
